content: cid 5 cid 7 cid 9 cid 10 cid 2 cid 4 cid 6 cid 8 cid 1 cid 3 cid 5 repeat 23 times 5 3 through the back loop note on ssk slip slip knit for note on cdd central double an ssk stitch that mirrors the k2tog decrease for the cdd stitch the two stitch beautifully slip one stitch as if to stitches should be slipped together and knit slip the next stitch as if to purl knitwise and then insert the left needle into the front loops of the slipped stitches and knit them together from this position i e through the back loops 6
